pullRequest.title: Add missing descriptions in JDBC API Docs(1.2.x)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Add missing descriptions in JDBC API Docs
Fixes #21625
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

commit.message: Add missing descriptions in JDBC API Docs
